title: Python FastAPI Best Practices
content: FastAPI best practices include using Pydantic models for request/response validation, implementing dependency injection for database connections, and structuring your application with routers for better modularity. Always use async/await for I/O operations.

title: TypeScript Type Safety
content: TypeScript provides strong type safety for JavaScript applications. Use strict mode, avoid 'any' type, leverage union types and type guards. Consider using Zod or io-ts for runtime validation of external data.

title: React Performance Optimization
content: Optimize React performance by using React.memo for component memoization, useMemo and useCallback hooks to prevent unnecessary re-renders, and code-splitting with React.lazy for faster initial load times.

title: Database Indexing Strategies
content: Effective database indexing strategies include creating indexes on frequently queried columns, using composite indexes for multi-column queries, and monitoring index usage with query execution plans. Avoid over-indexing as it impacts write performance.

title: API Design Guidelines
content: RESTful API design guidelines recommend using proper HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), implementing versioning (v1, v2), using consistent naming conventions, and providing comprehensive error responses with appropriate status codes.
